keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increase police presence and demand an Eastleigh police station
Improve our vital infrastructure and services (roads, doctors, schools)
Rejuvenate and revitalise our high streets
Support the right kind of housing developments
Give you, the people of Eastleigh, a voice!

mentions.candidate: I've had enough and I'm pretty sure you have too... I've lived in Eastleigh for 30 years and this is the worst it has been. It’s time for someone local to take over, and drive change and get things done for our community.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Together, we can ensure that Eastleigh doesn't suffer as the Tories hide the truth behind a Brexit smokescreen.

issues.brexitEurope: Together, we can ensure that Eastleigh doesn't suffer as the Tories hide the truth behind a Brexit smokescreen.
issues.health: Improve our vital infrastructure and services (roads, doctors, schools)

housing.content: Support the right kind of housing developments

leaflet.personalStatement: I've had enough and I'm pretty sure you have too... I've lived in Eastleigh for 30 years and this is the worst it has been. It’s time for someone local to take over, and drive change and get things done for our community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Established a community club to help support the people of Eastleigh

contactInformation.address: Eastleigh Labour Party 69 Leigh Road, Eastleigh SO50 9DF

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by Steve Willoughby on behalf of The Eastleigh Labour Party both at 69 Leigh Road, Eastleigh, SO50 9DF. Printed by Stoclall Lane Colour Press, School Lane, Chandler's Ford, Eastleigh SO53 4DG
